message: Let's start with a reasonable offer. I take a bit more to start, and you get a sizable chunk too.
Your offer was a bit too much in your favor, Alice. How about we split things a bit more evenly this time? This ensures we both benefit from settling early.
Bob, we're running out of time and the pot is shrinking.  My turn to propose a slightly more even split. Let's settle this now and both come out ahead.
